title: The US claims it just strongarmed Taiwan into spending $250 billion on American chip manufacturing

The US claims it just strongarmed Taiwan into spending $250 billion on American chip manufacturing. The US just lowered Taiwan's tariffs in exchange for a massive domestic chipmaking promise, the Commerce Department announced on Thursday.
